intents.title: Bootstrap Fusbal governed project: requirements, provenance, evidence, portal

intents.title: Define V1 output contract + pipeline scaffolding

Tighten numeric/range validation for track/event fields

Match bundle layout + required artifacts

requirements_in_scope.title: When calibration quality is sufficient, generate bird’s-eye-view (BEV) tracks and video in pitch meters.
Calibration maps each camera to pitch coordinates with explicit quality gating and diagnostics.
Trust-first behavior: avoid identity swaps and ball/event hallucinations; prefer Unknown/missing over wrong.

tasks.title: Pitch templates + calibration inputs per venue/pitch
Auto-fit from field markings + diagnostics
Manual fallback + explicit calibration quality gating

requirements_in_scope.title: Detect and track all players per match with conservative identity continuity.
Assign players to Team A/B via bib colors (plus smoothing) with an Unknown state.

Deterministic unit tests for detections, MOT breaks, and team smoothing
Tighten contract validation for segment/break semantics

Reduce contract template drift by injecting schema snippets during generation

Bound MOT state and add out_of_view heuristic
Centralize diagnostics key constants

Player detector(s) per frame + confidence
Multi-object tracking with swap avoidance
Bib-color team assignment with smoothing

requirements_in_scope.title: Track the ball when visible and explicitly represent missing/unknown spans without hallucination.
Infer shots and goals conservatively in V1 (high precision) and emit confidence + evidence pointers.
Trust-first behavior: avoid identity swaps and ball/event hallucinations; prefer Unknown/missing over wrong.

tasks.title: Ball detector(s) + gating
Intermittent ball tracking + missing state
Conservative shots/goals inference
Ball detections: explicit per-frame missing/unknown records
Output contract: explicit ball detection/track schemas and examples
Ball detections: use centralized diagnostics key constants
Ball tracker: align break_reason/segment semantics with missing reasons
Shots/goals inference: add deterministic negative-scenario tests
Ball pos_state=unknown: define semantics + add tests for unevaluable frames
Ball tracker: implement explicit unknown emission path for unevaluable frames
Contract validation: strengthen ball-specific semantic checks and errors
Diagnostics quality_summary: add ball tracking quality metrics for conservative gating
Portal: visualize ball missing/unknown + event evidence pointers

intents.title: Video ingest → plumbing proof → baseline real detections (UAT)

requirements_in_scope.title: Track the ball when visible and explicitly represent missing/unknown spans without hallucination.
All sources emit a canonical track record format suitable for fusion and reporting.
Infer shots and goals conservatively in V1 (high precision) and emit confidence + evidence pointers.
Trust-first behavior: avoid identity swaps and ball/event hallucinations; prefer Unknown/missing over wrong.
Baseline real ball detections: given a provided futsal video, the pipeline can emit non-empty ball detections/tracks on at least a subset of frames with confidence and diagnostics.
Video ingest: given a local single-camera match video, the pipeline can decode frames deterministically and produce a time-indexed stream for downstream detectors/trackers.
End-to-end runner: ingest a video and export a valid V1 output bundle with tracks/events under `output/<match_id>/` (plumbing-first, deterministic).
All code units MUST be traceable to requirements; shared utilities map to SYS-ARCH-15.

tasks.title: Baseline local ball detector (real detections for UAT clip)
Regression test: synthetic baseline detector emits >=N present frames under configured thresholds
Baseline detector UAT fixture (synthetic, deterministic)
CLI ergonomics: explicit exit codes for common ingest/decode failures
Contract hardening: require diagnostics.frame_index for all ball track records
Diagnostics: persist per-frame ball detection diagnostics artifact
Deterministic ordering for events.json
Portal UX: surface latest audit run summaries on intent page
Portal: unit test for audit run list caching
End-to-end run-video: ingest film → export bundle (plumbing proof)
Test hardening: assert zero present ball records when detector disabled
Stream run-video (avoid buffering decoded frames)
Expose conservative shots/goals inference thresholds via run-video CLI flags
Optional strict validation and machine-readable validation report
Deterministic video ingest + frame timebase
Decouple Python video ingest from Node-based ffmpeg resolver fallback
Video tooling safety: timeouts + better stderr surfacing (ffprobe/ffmpeg)
Capture and gate ffmpeg/ffprobe versions in ingest diagnostics
